translated: Andrea di Pietro della Gondola, said Andrea Palladio was born in Padua November 30, 1508 and died in Vicenza August 19, 1580, is one of the most famous architects of the Italian Renaissance.
original: Andrea di Pietro della Gondola, dit Andrea Palladio, né à Padoue le 30 novembre 1508 et mort à Vicence le 19 août 1580, est un des plus célèbres architectes de la Renaissance italienne.
